author: Gordon Hinckley
message: Our kindness may be the most persuasive argument for that which we believe.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: Chaos is inherent in all compounded things. Strive on with diligence.
title: Thought of the day

author: Abraham Lincoln
message: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
title: Thought of the day
